title: DAX Fridays! #93: MAXX | Fill down with DAX and Power Query
excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to fill down columns with DAX and also with Power Query.  Enjoy!  Get Northwind Dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU  Link to DAX Fridays survey: http://bit.ly/2MMM4KK    Looking for a download file?
